feed.title: Akazam
feed.subtitle: Akazam is a solution to develop dApps and launch coding environments on Virtual Machines on servers along databases automagically with a self-hosted git called gitakaz to pin stuff on IPFS, all that in one single click.

entry.title: Welcome to Akazam!
entry.content:
Go ahead and clone it and use it and build new features. The most easy way to start is to read the readme.md

For contributing to these Blog Posts:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: Go ahead and clone it and use it and build new features. The most easy way to start is to read the readme.md https://github.com/git-akazam/magic-VMs.git #=> clone magic-VMs repo
